document_data.mainbody:
Chimo Pass was a pass located in Kozakura.
Chimo Pass was located in Fukudo Province on the island of Shinkoku. The Chimo Pass, the lowest and most accessible passage over the Dragons Spine, was a recent addition to the Imperial Post Road as of . At the passs peak, bamboo and fern forests merged with cedar trees near the town of Chimotoge, which was a vital junction for various smaller mountain trails.
